name: Closed Room 2
description:
====== Title ======

Closed Room 2

====== Story ======

Let's play in a japanese closed room!

You've got one minute to connect your friend's body to your head!

==== How to play ====

Up, down, left, right : "WSAD" key

Camera left/right rotation : Mouse drag

Get the body and head : Left mouse click

===== Contact =====

Twitter : @tarothethird

URL : https://taroyan3rd.com/
